doc.title: 韩京宇
doc.body: 研究方向1：大数据管理技术异构数据集成；图数据的建模、索引和查询；时空-社会数据的索引和挖掘分析技术。研究方向2：Web数据管理信息抽取；不确定性数据存储和索引；知识图构建。研究方向3：时空数据管理空间时态数据的建模、存储、索引、查询和智能分析技术。研究方向4：计算社会学公共行为规律的分析和揭示。(Research Interest）The goal of my research is to help people organize, store, and query information from independent sources, especially of Web data, spatial-temporal data, social data and graph data. My research aims at answering the following questions: （1）How to efficiently organize data from different kinds of web sources? How to effectively glean knowledge to get a comprehensive understanding of the real world?（2）How to understand people’s behavior and provide information in an online fashion according to their geo-social invironment?My current research interests focus on the following topics including (a) data quality, data integration and data mining (b) Web data management(c) spatial-temporal database, geo-social data(d) graph data (e) computational social science.
